General.Name: Newmax Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Newmax Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, manufacture, and sale of photographic/optical equipment, electronic parts/components, and electrical machinery/supplies in China, Taiwan, Japan, Vietnam, and internationally. It manufactures and sells optics mirror and plastic lens to optical equipment manufacturers and computer peripheral digital imaging manufacturers. The company also engages in investment holdings and international trading activities. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
